reviewComments: This is a wonderful place to sit outside in the evening and enjoy a good meal in a relaxed setting - make it a special stop.
A fun shopping and dining day! Parking is easy and there is a variet of stores and restaurants.

Nice farmers market on Sunday mornings - great little walk around the shops and awesome coffee shop.

With lots of restaurants and quaint shops this is fun place to spend an afternoon. Good Sunday farmer's market.
Old Town La Quinta is a lovely place to stroll around and teh outdoor restaurants are great.
This is a nice place to visit. Lots of different types of shops. It's a beautiful location in the desert. Easy to get around and find what you are looking for
There is little or nothing to draw you in and keep your interest. You are better off with a good book pool side.

there are lots of restaurants to eat. nice area so you are safe to walk the streets at night. close to a hotel, library and a park, and a post office

Fun to kill a few hours. Has Salona and Hogs Breath Inn (Clint Eastwood's place) Fun little stores, including a nice Olive Oil place.
We always takes guest to visit Old Town: Solano's is great for either lunch or dinner. Clint's Eastwood's Hog's Breathe is a definite place to stop -- good Happy Hour.

Love this place. Shops and restaurants to fit all tastes. Check out Gracie's and the Olive Oil store. Best chai latte I've had is served up at the Old Town Coffee Shop.
